title: Guided Hormesis Breathing: Reset Your Nervous System
description:
Don't do this breathwork in water or when driving.
🫁 My breathwork courses: https://kitarowaga.com/kitaros-breathwork-courses
✅ Weekly tips on breathwork and mindfulness: https://kitarowaga.com/#weekly-newsletter

---

A little bit about myself: I'm Kitaro, a breathwork instructor and Movement enthusiast. If you like my vibe, please subscribe to this channel. 

Timestamps (to save you some time):
00:00 Preparation
01:02 Start Breathing Session

channelDescription:
Hey friends 👋, my name is Kitaro, and I teach people to breathe more fully, move more freely, think more clearly, connect more deeply, and feel more lively. 

Thank you for your support and for tagging along on my journey.
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/f0pGZLx_v0w" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: If you want to learn more specific breathwork and mindfulness techniques, then get my NEW free 15-day breathwork course here: https://kitarowaga.kit.com/15-day-breathwork-course

For me the best WHM guided breathing I found until now. All others have static breathing countdowns, here we increase speed at own level. Additional I pause the video for longer breathholds. Thank you!
Doing it at 5AM today, thanks for existing buddy
Kitaro, I'm two months sober and you have helped me every single day. Thank you for giving me this beautiful gift.
It may be a little bit overwhelming for beginners, but it works like wonder. My anxiety was gone after two round, and positive thoughts started to pop up in my mind.
